title: FT: Looking to trade some fun cards for EPDGs
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Looking to trade some fun cards for EPDGs
posts.post_content:
Have these available for trade:
Pattee
Leifield batting Piedmont 42
Tinker Sovereign 150
Durham

[IMG]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4655/26037516948_4715afe6bb_o.jpg[/IMG]
